modelDetails.description:
EX70

Tata Hitachi’s EX 70 Super+ Series is a time tested, reliable, productive hydraulic excavator that operates proficiently in tight spaces while minimizing the operational costs.

Specs:

Engine Power: 55PS @ 2000 rpm
Operating Weight: 7000 KG
Bucket Capacity: 0.10 m³ - 0.68m³

EX200LC - Pump:

Powered by Hitachi 's original Optimum Hydraulic system.Cross sensing summation system for better utilization of pumps improving its life.Absolute type hydraulic filter to protect the hydraulic system.

EX200LC - Engine:

Powered by reliable and fuel efficient Tata 497 engine. Original Tata Hitachi technology for Auto Idle and Auto Deceleration for higher fuel efficiency. Stepper motor based precise engine speed control for dial type throttle.Different mode selection to suit different application.

EX200LC - Swing Motor:

Reliable aggregates with low maintenance cost and longer life for better performance.

EX200LC - Travel Device:

Reliable aggregates with low maintenance cost and longer life for better performance

EX200LC - Control Valve:

Powered by Hitachi's original Optimum Hydraulic system.Original pilot circuit.Boom and Arm regeneration,holding valves for higher efficiency and safety.Spare spool for trouble free attachment operations.
